EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment (1385500129.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Barbara, I wanted to follow up on the email below and introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here. <https://my.timedriver.com/Y3NJC> You can watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. You can learn more about how MBO works by clicking here <http://www.mbopartners.com/how-mbo-works>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Thanks,Meghan ___________________Meghan MoulConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6359f: 703.793.6473e: mmoul@mbopartners.com <mailto:mmoul@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=moul> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. From: Brendan Dillon Sent: Tuesday, November 26, 2013 3:40 PM To: bkirk90052@aol.com Cc: Meghan Moul Subject: MBO Partners Enrollment Hello Barbara, I would like to introduce you to Meghan Moul, who is a specialist is bringing individuals like yourself onboard with MBO. She’ll be a great resource to educate you on MBO and answer the many questions you probably have. I’ll let you call communicate directly in order to schedule a time to speak. Thank you! ___________________________________BRENDAN DILLONAccount Manager, Enterprise SolutionsMBO Partners t: 703.793.6356f: 703.793.6070e: bdillon@mbopartners.com <mailto:bdillon@mbopartners.com>w: www.mboenterprise.com <http://www.mboenterprise.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
